mapper.update:
update b_otaorder_mac
orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysno = #{sysno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceimei = #{deviceimei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update b_otaorder_mac set orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysno = #{sysno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceimei = #{deviceimei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, simsn = #{simsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wifimacaddr = #{wifimacaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blmacaddr = #{blmacaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select m.id, m.orderID, m.uuid, m.sysno, m.deviceimei, m.simsn, m.wifimacaddr, m.blmacaddr from b_otaorder_mac m left JOIN b_otaorder o on m.orderId = o.id where m.uuid = #{uuid} and o.OrderStatus in
#{item}
